verbs.description: After [V: traveling] [ARG1: through Mexico] [ARGM-MNR: with great fanfare] [ARGM-TMP: for a month] [ARGM-LOC: under the Trump administration 's watchful eye] , nearly 200 Central American migrants attempting to seek asylum in the United States ...
